settings.caption: You Choose Ingredients That Are Good For You

settings.heading: Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil
settings.text:
SOURCE: Olive tree.

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

Moisturizes hair and reduces scalp irritation, softens and strengthens hair by penetrating the hair shaft and preserving moisture.

​

CATEGORY: Natural; Organic

settings.heading: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil
settings.text:
SOURCE:

Seeds of a shrub native to the American Sonoran Desert.

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

Prevents hair loss and promotes hair thickness. It acts as a dandruff remedy and is rich in vitamins C, B, E, copper, and zinc that nourish hair.

​

CATEGORY: Natural; Organic

settings.heading: Cocos Nucifera Oil
settings.text:
SOURCE: Meat of coconuts.

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

Protects hair from breakage, acts as an antibacterial agent and it is moisturizing and nutrient-rich.

​

CATEGORY: Naturally Derived

settings.heading: Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract
settings.text:
SOURCE:

Oil extracted from marigold flowers.

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

Promotes hair growth and treats dandruff. Its regenerative properties help hair follicles grow abundantly and the antioxidants protect against cell-damaging free radicals.

​

CATEGORY: Naturally Derived

settings.heading: Chamomile Recutita Flower Extract
settings.text:
SOURCE:

Flowers of the Chamomile plant.

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

This extract protects hair from adverse environmental conditions, is effective for treating oily hair, strengthens the roots, and promotes growth.

​

CATEGORY: Naturally Derived

settings.heading: Hydrogenated Castor Oil
settings.text:
SOURCE: Castor bean.

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

Promotes hair growth, thickens hair and reduces, prevents, and helps to hide damage. Its amino acids moisturize and soften hair.

​

CATEGORY: Naturally Derived

settings.heading: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
settings.text:
SOURCE: Sunflower

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

Reduces product build-up, dry scalp and early hair loss.  Prevents damage to cells by ultraviolet light while its antibacterial properties help keep the scalp microbial free.

​

CATEGORY: Natural; Organic

settings.heading: Hydrolyzed Soy Protein
settings.text:
SOURCE: Soya beans.

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

Improves hair's elasticity, resiliency, and increases shine by improving the body and texture of hair.

​

CATEGORY: Naturally Derived

settings.heading: Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil
settings.text:
SOURCE:

Kernels of the argan tree.

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

Rich in essential fatty acids, vitamin E, and other vital nutrients, it helps to smooth frizz and split ends as well as softening your hair and boosting shine.

​

CATEGORY: Naturally Organic

settings.heading: Bertholletia Excelsa (Brazil) Nut Oil
settings.text:
SOURCE: Brazil nut

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

Contains high amounts of omega 6 and 9 fatty acids, conditioning the hair naturally and making it shine. It’s also an excellent source of selenium, a mineral that helps boost hair growth.

​

CATEGORY: Naturally Organic

settings.heading: Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter
settings.text:
SOURCE:

Seeds of a palm tree native to Brazil

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

Rich moisturizer that softens the hair while locking in moisture, restoring hair, and maintaining elasticity.

​

CATEGORY: Naturally Organic

settings.heading: Citric Acid
settings.text:
SOURCE: Citrus fruits

​

BENEFITS/ WHY IS IT GOOD FOR ME?

Gets rid of dandruff and boosts hair growth, rich in flavonoid, iron, and vitamin C that helps balance the scalp's pH, reduces excess oil, and strengthens hair follicles.

​

CATEGORY: Naturally Organic
